title: Wrangler Women's Willow Mid Rise Boot Cut Ultimate Riding Jeans
description: PERFORMANCE FIT. This mid rise jean sits above the hip -- designed with a no-gap waistband with a higher back and a lower front for full coverage and comfort while riding. This jean is fitted through the seat and thigh and built to fit over your favorite pair of boots.

THE ULTIMATE RIDING JEAN. These are trailblazing jeans. Practice makes perfect jeans. Roping, riding and making it all look easy jeans. Jeans you feel at home in, whether you're in the saddle or in town -- that's what makes them the Ultimate Riding Jean.
DURABLE COMFORT. Made to keep you comfortable in the saddle, these riding jeans are made with flat comfort seams to prevent uncomfortable chafing.
ICONIC EMBELLISHMENTS. This boot cut riding jean is finished with our decorative stitching on the back pockets and contrast seams. Maintain that effortless classic style with an innovative fit.

FIVE POCKET STYLING. Constructed with our classic five-pocket jean styling, this Ultimate Riding Jean is made with (2) embroidered hip pockets, (1) angled patch watch pocket, and (2) front scoop pockets.
INSEAM MEASUREMENTS: Short = 30", Regular/Blank = 32", Long = 34", Extra Long = 36", Tall = 38"
Wrangler Womens Willow Mid Rise Performance Waist Boot Cut Ultimate Riding Jeans
